en: True, the school has to do something but it isn't doing a good job.

kr: “특정감사”는 특정한 업무·사업·자금 등에 대하여 문제점을 파악하여 원인과 책임 소재를 규명하고 개선대책을 마련하기 위하여 실시하는 감사를 말한다.
en: The term "specific audit" means an audit conducted to identify problems, causes and responsibility for specific tasks, projects, and funds, and come up with measures for improvement .

kr: “아동학대”란 보호자를 포함한 성인에 의하여 아동의 건강·복지를 해치거나 정상적 발달을 저해할 수 있는 신체적·정신적·성적 폭력 또는 가혹행위 및 아동의 보호자에 의하여 이루어지는 유기와 방임을 말한다.
en: The term "child abuse" means physical, mental, sexual violence, or other cruel acts done by an adult, including a guardian, that could harm the health and welfare or undermine the normal development of a child, or abandonment and negligence committed by a child's guardian.

kr: 부회장은 회장을 보좌하여 회장이 불가피한 사유로 직무를 수행할 수 없을 때 차기 회장 선출 시까지 그 직무를 대행한다.
en: The Vice-Chairperson shall assist the Chairperson and act on behalf of the Chairperson until the next Chairperson is elected when the Chairperson is unable to perform his/her duties due to any unavoidable cause.

en: The head of the headquarters shall maintain emergency preparedness, such as calls for emergency service, by establishing an emergency contact system of persons who have completed prior education.

en: The practice of each choir shall be divided into regular practice and special practice, and regular practice shall be conducted at least once a week, and special practice shall be conducted when the head of the group deems it necessary to prepare for competitions and concerts.

en: Where it is otherwise deemed impracticable for the project owner to apply the payment confirmation system, such as where it is impracticable to do financial transaction of each interested party.

en: Where various meetings, etc. are held through a consultative body, the head of the Gu may pay allowances, travel expenses, etc. to members who are not district public officials within budget.

kr: 지금까지 510편이 넘는 SCI 논문을 발표했고 그 업적을 인정받아 한국공학한림원 공학기술상과 한국과학기술한림원 덕명한림원상, 미국기계학회 스마트구조물·시스템 최우수연구자상등 주요 과학기술상을 수상해왔다.
en: He/She has published more than 510 SCI papers so far and has won major science and technology awards, including the National Academy of Engineering of Korea's Engineering Technology Award, the Korean Academy of Science and Technology's Deokmyeong Academy Award, and the American Society of Mechanical Engineers' Smart Structures and Systems' Best Researcher Award in recognition of his achievements.

en: The head of the Gu may establish and operate the Climate Change Fund to promote policy measures for countering climate change to reduce greenhouse gases, and matters concerning the establishment and operation of the Climate Change Fund shall be prescribed separately by municipal ordinance.

en: The head of the Gu shall establish and implement an annual child abuse prevention plan, including the following matters, to prevent and deter child abuse:

kr: 위치 기반 기술을 적용한 서비스로, 소비자가 엘페이를 사용할 수 있는 매장의 반경 20m 안을 지날 때 실시간 쿠폰과 이벤트 및 할인 정보를 보내준다.
en: The service, which the location based technology was applied, sends real-time coupons, and information of events and discounts when a customer passes through the area within a 20-meter radius from the store where L.Pay can be used.

kr: 제2항에도 불구하고 인계자의 타 기관 전출 등으로 업무관리시스템 및 전자문서시스템을 이용한 인계인수가 불가능하거나 서면을 이용한 인계인수가 적합하다고 판단되는 경우에는 서면으로 인계인수서를 작성할 수 있다.
en: Notwithstanding paragraph (2), a handover confirmation letter may be prepared in writing where it is not possible to take over using the task management system and the electronic document system due to the transfer of the transferor to another institution, or if it is deemed appropriate to take over using the letter.

kr: 어서 오세요. 환전 도와드리겠습니다. 여권 보여주시겠어요?
en: Hello, I'll help you with the currency exchange. Could you show me your passport?

kr: 구청장은 채택제안이 성질상 구의 업무범위에 속하고 공무원의 현재 또는 과거의 직무에 속하는 「발명진흥법」에 의한 직무발명 또는 「실용신안법」에 의한 직무고안 이거나 「디자인보호법」에 의한 직무디자인에 해당될 경우에 그 권리를 승계한다.
en: The head of the Gu shall succeed to the right in the case that the adopted proposal belongs to the scope of affairs  of the Gu in its nature or if it is the duty invention under the Invention Promotion Act, duty conception under the Utility Model Act, or duty design under the Design Protection Act, all of which belong to a public official's current of former duties.

kr: 김영환 바른미래당 경기지사 후보는 7일 국회에서 기자회견을 열고 “이 후보가 김씨와의 연인관계나 사생활 문제에 거짓말을 하고 있다”면서 “지금이라도 진실을 고백하고 국민께 사죄하라”고 주장했다.
en: Kim Young-hwan, the gubernatorial candidate for Gyeonggi-do for the Bareun Mirae Party, told at a press conference at the National Assembly on the 7th, "Candidate Lee is lying about his relationship with Kim and his personal life. Even now, he should confess the truth and apologize to the people."

kr: 네, 그리고 가격도 10% 하향 조절을 요구합니다.
en: Yes, and they also asked for a 10% decrease in price.

kr: 교육장의 시설 및 설비를 사용하고자 하는 자(이하 “사용자”라 한다)는 구청장의 허가를 받아야 한다.
en: A person who intends to use the facilities and equipment of the head of the district office of education (hereinafter referred to as "user") shall obtain permission from the head of the Gu.

en: Although the Asahi Shimbun first released the report, reporter Aizawa also reported a series of follow-up special articles, including that Ministry of Finance agreed to coincide with the academy.

en: The head of the Gu may designate and utilize experts and specialized institutions related to the management of public conflicts in order to perform the following affairs:

kr: “국기선양”이란 국기를 존중하고 사랑하는 마음을 높이고 국기의 존엄성이 유지될 수 있도록 하는 일체의 활동을 말한다.
en: Respecting the Flag means any activity that respects the national flag, increases the love of the people and ensures that the dignity of the flag is maintained.

kr: 법 제6조에 따른 야생생물의 서식실태를 조사하는 경우
en: In case of investigating the habitat status of wild animals according to Article 6 of the Act;

kr: 서울특별시 노원구민(이하 "구민"이라 한다)의 생활 및 문화활동 등 증진에 크게 기여한 사람
en: A person who has greatly contributed to the improvement of life and cultural activities of Nowon-gu in Seoul Metropolitan Government (hereinafter referred to a "Gu resident");

en: Conduct self-evaluation for the result of operating the Self-Check System once a year and report the results to the working committee and notify the working division thereof

en: The committee Chairperson shall represent and oversee the work of the committee.

kr: 반면 같은 기간 장갑을 끼고 영수증을 만진 경우 BPA 농도는 0.47ng으로 업무 전(0.51ng)과 별 차이가 없었다.
en: On the other hand, wearing gloves and touching receipts during the same period, the BPA concentration was 0.47 ng, which was not significantly different from before work (0.51 ng).

en: Operation and management of systems based on electronic settlement linked servers, etc.

kr: 계엄법은 일 년이 지난 1949년에야 만들어졌기 때문에, 당시는 계엄법이 아직 존재하지도 않았을 때였다.
en: Since the Martial Law Act was made only a year later in 1949, it was when the Martial Law Act had not yet existed.

en: May I bring friends from another school?

en: Where a member who has obtained permission for leave attended the Council before the end of the requested leave, the permission for the leave after the date of his/her appearance shall become invalid.

kr: “소송수행자”란 행정소송과 헌법재판소 관할심판을 직접 수행하도록 지정 받은 공무원을 말한다.
en: The term "litigation performer" means a public official who is designated to directly execute the administrative litigation and judicial review of the Constitutional Court.

kr: 구청장은 제2항제2호의 징계사유에 해당하는 공무원이 있는 경우 관할 인사위원회 또는 징계위원회에 징계의결을 요구하거나 감사대상기관의 장 또는 징계의결 요구권자에게 그 사실을 통보하거나 징계를 요구하도록 지시하여야 한다.
en: If there is a public official who falls under the ground of disciplinary reasons referred to in paragraph 2 (2), the head of the Gu shall demand a disciplinary action to the Personnel Committee or the Disciplinary Committee. Or the head of the Gu shall direct the requesting authority of the organization to be audited to notify the requestor or demand disciplinary action.

kr: 지역주민(청소년, 다문화가정 등 포함)을 위한 문화행사, 전시회, 생활체육활동, 문화탐방 등 문화여가 기능
en: Cultural leisure functions, such as cultural events, exhibitions, sports for all, and cultural visits for local residents (including youth, multi-cultural families, etc.);

kr: 구청장은 이용료 등의 납부에 지역화폐를 사용하게 할 수 있으며, 세부내용은 서울특별시 노원구 지역화폐 운영에 관한 조례에서 정하는 바에 따른다.
en: The head of the Gu may allow users to use local currency for usage fees and other payments, and details shall follow the Nowon-gu Seoul Metropolitan Government Ordinance on Local Currency Operations
